item.description:
Hey Incubators!! Sorry for the delay and an alteration...

This Thursday I'm inviting you all to come out to a one night only event at ImprovBoston.

It's Parallelogramophonograph!!

One night only from Austin, Texas Parallelogramophonograph's 2009 East Coast Whistle Stop Tour comes to ImprovBoston. The show that the Austin Chronicle called, "Inspired Improvisation" has been featured at the Chicago Improv Festival, The Hawaii Improgvaganza, the Providence Improv Fest and Out of Bounds. Their original improvised plays have run the gauntlet of styles - from historic and highly stylized period dramas. Don't miss your chance to see these gifted award-winning story tellers.

I heard their shows a blast so I figure we should drop by and check it out!

For those of you missing out on our usual incubation, I do promise we'll get the flow going again.

I hope to see some of you there. I'm fresh off lots of workshops and have tons of fun exercises I can't wait ti pass along!

Might be a good idea to call ahead for reservations for this show too. It's $10 or $7 for students. 617-576-1253

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.name: What's a Parallelogramophonograph??? Find out on Thursday!
